perturbation.original_text:
3.5. Due Date for Payment. Your Royalty payments and Advertising Contributions are due by the first (1st) day after the end of each
Period (or the next business day if the first day is a Sunday or federal holiday) (as of the Agreement Date, the due date is Monday of each week).
You must pay all other amounts due to us as specified in this Agreement or, if no time is specified, such amounts are due upon receipt of an invoice
from us.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.5. Due Date for Payment. Your Royalty payments and Advertising Contributions are due by the first (1st) day after the end of each
Period (or the next business day if the first day is a Sunday or federal holiday) (as of the Agreement Date, the due date is Monday of each week).
You must pay all other amounts due to us as specified in this Agreement within 10 days of receipt of an invoice from us.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment term for amounts due outside of Royalty payments and Advertising Contributions. The original text states that such amounts are due upon receipt of an invoice. In contrast, the modified text specifies a 10-day payment window from the invoice date. This introduces potential conflicts in the enforcement of payment deadlines.

perturbation.original_text:
4.3 Location Development and Preparation. You must construct, furnish, and open the Franchised Business as required by this
Agreement and must open the Franchised Business not later than six (6) months after securing the necessary authorization and approval for
permits and/or certificates. Time is of the essence.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.3 Location Development and Preparation. You must construct, furnish, and open the Franchised Business as required by this
Agreement and must open the Franchised Business not later than twelve (12) months after securing the necessary authorization and approval for
permits and/or certificates. Time is of the essence.
perturbation.explanation: Here, the deadline for opening the Franchised Business post-authorization is changed from 'six (6) months' to 'twelve (12) months.' This creates a direct contradiction, as different sections could refer to either deadline, leading to confusion about compliance.

perturbation.original_text:
9.5. Advertising Approval. You agree to conduct all advertising in a dignified manner and to conform to the standards and requirements
we specify from time to time in the Manual or other written materials. We will make available to you approved advertising and promotional materials,
including signs, posters, collaterals, etc. that we have prepared. We will have the final decision on all creative development of advertising and
promotional messages. You must submit to us in writing, for our approval before your use, all proposed plans, promotion materials, and advertising
that we did not prepare or approve in the previous year. If you do not receive our written approval within 10 business days from the date we
received the material, the material is deemed disapproved. We reserve the right to require you to discontinue the use of any advertising or
marketing materials.
perturbation.changed_text:
9.5. Advertising Approval. You agree to conduct all advertising in a dignified manner and to conform to the standards and requirements
we specify from time to time in the Manual or other written materials. We will make available to you approved advertising and promotional materials,
including signs, posters, collaterals, etc. that we have prepared. We will have the final decision on all creative development of advertising and
promotional messages. You must submit to us in writing, for our approval before your use, all proposed plans, promotion materials, and advertising
that we did not prepare or approve in the previous year. If you do not receive our written approval within 30 business days from the date we
received the material, the material is deemed approved. We reserve the right to require you to discontinue the use of any advertising or
marketing materials.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation modifies the advertising approval clause. The original states that if no response is received within 10 days, the material is disapproved. Now, the text says that within 30 business days without response it is approved. This creates an enforcement challenge.
